ygData.subject: Re: RE: Another Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I see what you mean, I don t see a rouge dwarf smithing, but I do see a elvish ranger fletching. I suppose it really depends. ... Er. I see the dwarf
ygData.messageBody:
Well I see what you mean, I don't see a rouge dwarf smithing, but I do see a elvish ranger fletching. I suppose it really depends.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Er. I see the dwarf connection to smithing. I don't see the other two.
Why would my druid want to fletch? Or my bard for that matter?

And I see high elves as the jewelry type. Gnomes have tinkering already.
High Elves are so proud, they would be the one to perfect such an idea.

However, I think that this would not be something to add after the
game is already out, etc. it should have been added before, if at all.
